statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_level, transaction_id FROM compliance_reports;
SELECT report_id, compliance_level FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_level > 5 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, compliance_level, report_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_level < 3 ORDER BY compliance_level ASC, report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_level = 3 AND report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, compliance_level FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_level DESC, report_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports, AVG(compliance_level) AS avg_compliance FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_level > 5 AND report_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, report_date, compliance_status FROM reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM reports GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_id = 1
SELECT report_name, report_data FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports, customers WHERE compliance_reports.report_id = 3 AND customers.customer_id = 5
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT report_id, report_name, LENGTH(report_data) AS data_length FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND product_price > 500;
SELECT report_type, report_date, report_content FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT description FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, generated_by FROM compliance_reports WHERE regulation_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount FROM transactions_history WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT timestamp, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customers.name, transactions.amount FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount > 500;

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.amount, regulations.description FROM transactions LEFT JOIN compliance_reports ON transactions.transaction_id = compliance_reports.regulation_id LEFT JOIN regulations ON compliance_reports.regulation_id = regulations.regulation_id;

SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, compliance_reports.generated_by AS generated_by FROM customers JOIN compliance_reports ON customers.customer_id = compliance_reports.regulation_id WHERE compliance_reports.report_date >= '2022-01-01';
